CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Valor_de_entrada__c), "", SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(ROUND(Valor_de_entrada__c, 2)), ".", ",") & IF(MOD(ROUND(Valor_de_entrada__c, 2), 1) == 0, ",00", RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND(Valor_de_entrada__c * 100, 0)), 2))) & IF(LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) > 3, "." & RIGHT(LEFT(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c)), LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) - 3), 3), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) > 6, "." & RIGHT(LEFT(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c)), LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) - 6), 3), "") & IF(LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) > 9, "." & RIGHT(LEFT(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c)), LEN(TEXT(FLOOR(Valor_de_entrada__c))) - 9), 3), "")
CustomField.label: Valor da entrada*
